price: 「あなた方の作物へと、朝早く出かけよ。もしあなた方が、（それを）摘み取るのならば」と。
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
